meanings.definition: The act of making a sudden attack or raid from a defensive position.
meanings.sent1: The sortieing of the soldiers caught the enemy off guard.
meanings.sent2: The commander planned a sortieing to surprise the opposing forces.
meanings.sent3: During the game, the unexpected sortieing of the team led to a victory.
meanings.sent4: The sortieing of ideas in the meeting sparked a lively discussion.
meanings.sent5: The swift and decisive sortieing changed the course of the battle.

meanings.definition: To make a sudden attack or raid from a defensive position.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers were sortieing to defend their territory.
meanings.sent2: The pirates decided to sortieing under the cover of darkness.
meanings.sent3: The cat enjoys sortieing around the house and surprising its owner.
meanings.sent4: The students were sortieing through the library for hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The ninja was skilled at silently sortieing in and out of enemy territory.
